snippet.title: Wizard of Legend 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Learn about your arcana, upgrades, relics, dungeon upgrades, and check out gameplay in this new trailer for Wizard of Legend 2, an upcoming rogue-lite sequel coming to PC. A demo for Wizard of Legend 2 is available now on Steam. Face perilous magical trials in Wizard of Legend 2, featuring up to 4-player co-op & vibrant new 3D visuals. Master new Arcana and elements, experiment with spell combinations, and seek immortality to become a Wizard of Legend!
